name: Ben's Summer Game
description:
Made in 2 weeks as part of Bar SK's Summer Christmas Jam.

Controls:
Mouse move + Mouse Left Click

[Exhibition Build (the gamejam one)]

  • Idle Reset after 45 secs
  • Escape to exit
  • F to toggle fullscreen
  • R to restart game
  • E to goto next scene
  • Q to go back a scene

no sound either... it'll get added later maybe??
